name: Sloth Slothington
text: I don’t care what the other people think about this place. I’ve been to other little Caesars and their pizza is garbage. Somehow the people that work here make the pizza taste so good. I feel that it’s a treat to eat here

name: Martin Dockery
text: Most unreliable pizza place EVER! No pizzas ready. Not open on time. Don't answer their phone. Credit card machine broken. Does not have change for cash. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!!

name: Ryan Thomas
text: Closed at 5pm on a Wednesday. Construction going on in the parking lot but this place is still accessable. No reason they shouldn't be open. SAD. …More

name: Ryan Vickers
text: So I should have know that there was going to be a poor experience when I walked in and all the employees were all shouting "Not It!" Trying to determine who had to help us. We had called in an order and the for three different pizzas. 1 …More

name: Daisy escamilla
text: I walked in there 15min before closing wanting to by the deep crust pizza but I would take whatever be available knowing they were near closing but they had NOTHING. So Disappointed.

name: Miranda Green
text: Ordered a deep dish pepperoni and crazy bread...sat down and waitied... Employees were unprofessional running around screaming at each other...pizza was undercooked...and if it wasn't for the crazy bread being right out of the oven and simply amazing I would have given this location 1 star...

name: Kevin V.
text: When I'm starving and want pizza fast, I go to Little Caesars.  It's hard to beat their $5 large cheese or pepperoni deal!!  Also the garlic crazy bread w/ sauce makes a great snack.

name: Sean Casey
text: Good neighborhood (for Me :)) pizza at a Good Price! Fast and Good! You can usually walk in and get their signature 'Hot-N-Ready' in about 2mins from start to finish. ;-)

name: Oak Hill Motorsports
text: Won't answer the phone, so I can't place my order. I'll try a different pizza chain :(

name: 1B Views
text: I have to give this place 3 stars because its pizza is great but last time I called to order no one picked up so yeah 3 stars ajit pai can die in a fire and net neutrality come back so yeah 3 stars

name: Starr Padilla
text: Waste of time and money. They have no clue what they are doing and the pizza is worse and worse each time. Tonight was the last time we ever go there. Tonight they forgot to make our order AGAIN !!!??? WTH?? Then gave us severely under …More

name: Dominick Wilson
text: The building is for lease don’t got here

name: Alex Martin
text: Literally not even open during its business hours. Shut this place down and get it off my Google search.

name: Amanda Sauceda
text: They were friendly and fast

name: Noelle Gallardo
text: Pizza was fresh. Chicken wings were overcooked and old. Staff was NOT friendly

name: Bud Zapata
text: No hours listed, no online ordering capability, all menu items have a price of $0 on the website. Worst rated pizza restaurant in a 30+ mile radius. Why does anyone even go here?

name: Megan Pritchett
text: Been calling for several minutes, no one picking up the phone.  They gave me a pizza that wasn't cut.  I didn't have time to go back and have it cut.  No lunch for me today.

name: Merc 390
text: Don’t waste your time, they have a hand written notice that they are closed for the foreseeable future.

name: Josie Kenyon
text: Employees look like they are on crack never seen nothing like that worse place ever

name: C REESE
text: Never has any pizza ready....Not once

name: james johnson
text: Clean Curtis employees

name: Sofi Guerrero
text: soo good

name: Santiago Buenrostro
text: Worst service ever !!!

name: Catherine Elizabeth
text: The worst little Caesars experience ever! Find a different location.

name: James Beswick
text: $5 for Hot and Ready pepperoni pizza - what's there not to like?!
